name: I Wanna File The Restraining Order
name_original: I Wanna File The Restraining Order
description:
I Wanna File the Restraining Order is a gamed highly inspired by I wanna run the marathon and I wanna be the guy. It's a precision platformer consisting of 5 worlds to go through. It's pretty hard but definitely beatable. Have fun!

Quick tutorial if you haven't played another I wanna game:

You shoot checkpoints to save your position. The default controls (they can be changed) are:

Jump - left shift

Walk - arrows

Shoot - z

Retry - r

Quick side note: If you change the retry keybind the deathscreen will still say R but it's lying.
